title: 09/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about the Cowboys losing their All Pro offensive lineman and why this is very bad news for Dallas as they prepare to take on the defending Super Bowl Champion Buccaneers to kick off the 2021 season. He discusses Alabama's dominating win over Miami and how Nick Saban has continued to keep their dynasty alive for well over a decade. He also tells you why he was right about Cam Newton and wrong about the Dodgers. Plus, Fox Sports Football analyst Brock Huard joins the show to explain how Chip Kelly rebuilt the UCLA football program and why they'll win the PAC 12 this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
